EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_NYC_Q119.GP Summit - 3/6/19
EmailTemplate.subject: What do outer space, fullstream oil, and college housing have in common?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-4&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-summit-2019]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join the largest gathering of Greenplum and Postgres experts in the world March 18–22 in New York City to find out! Greenplum Summit <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-4&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=gp-summit-2019]]> happens on March 19 at PostgresConf <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019]]>. Come hear senior data and analytics luminaries share how they leverage the power of Postgres and Greenplum’s massive scalability for business innovation.
Save 25% off your conference pass A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit. Get a 25% discount on PostgresConf registration <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/buytickets]]> with promo code “2019_GREENPLUM”. Greenplum Summit session highlights:
- Distributing Big Astronomical Catalogs with Greenplum <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/program/proposals/distributing-big-astronomical-catalogues-with-greenplum]]> - Pilar de Teodoro, Database Expert & Software Engineer, European Space Agency - How Baker Hughes, a GE Company, Migrated Its Data Lake to AWS and Greenplum <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/program/proposals/how-baker-hughes-a-ge-company-migrated-its-data-lake-to-aws-and-greenplum]]> - Jayaraman Thiagarajan, Senior Director, Data & Analytics, Baker Hughes - Building Models Quickly: Addressing Housing Overflow at Purdue <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/program/proposals/using-greenplum-to-address-housing-shortages]]> - Ian Pytlarz, Senior Data Scientist, Purdue University - Petabyte Scale Data Warehousing with Open Source Greenplum Database <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/program/proposals/petabyte-scale-data-warehousing-with-open-source-greenplum-database-daf8fb29-80d5-4cf7-969c-0d6535a2b3e4]]> [Full-Day Training Course] - Marshall Presser, Greenplum Fellow and Author of Data Warehousing with Greenplum
After the conference join us for the webinar, "Reimagining Postgres in a Modern Application Setting." We’ve scheduled a thought-provoking webinar for you as a follow up to PostgresConf. Join industry analysts Stephen O’Grady from Redmonk and me, Jacque Istok, on March 28 at 11 am PDT to learn what’s driving the most significant adoption of Postgres. Sign up here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-28-reimagining-postgres-in-a-modern-application-setting-webinar?utm_source=gpsummit&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=reimagine-postgres&utm_term=q119]]>.
I hope to see you there, Jacque
